text: Kazimierz Chodakowski (20 June 1929 - 21 October 2017) was a Polish ice hockey defenceman and Olympian. Chodakowski represented Poland at the 1952 Winter Olympics and 1956 Winter Olympics. He also played for ŁKS Łódź in the Polish Hockey League.Society for International Hockey Research Database, retrieved June 29, 2015 ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Ice hockey players at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Ice hockey players at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Poland Category:Polish ice hockey defencemen Category:Sportspeople from Łódź
title: Kazimierz Chodakowski
